content: **judah socks free ribbed sock pattern** the **judah socks** are a classic stretchy ribbed sock pattern designed for ultimate comfort and a perfect fit worked **top-down with a heel flap** these socks hug the foot beautifully making them a great go-to for everyday wear inspired by the ** youth judah zipped cardigan 1 ** they feature the same textured ribbing for a cohesive timeless look this pattern includes **sizes from baby to large adult** so you can knit a pair for everyone in the family whether you re making cozy socks for tiny toes or warm snug socks for yourself this pattern is a joy to knit **pattern features ** ✔️ stretchy 1x1 rib for a perfect fit ✔️ top-down construction with a heel flap ✔️ sizes baby toddler child teen and large adult ✔️ perfect for gift knitting or matching family sets get the **judah socks free ribbed sock pattern** now and start knitting your new favorite pair 2 1 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-youth-judah-zipped-cardigan/ 2 https //amandammorse com/free-ribbed-sock-pattern-knit-the-cozy-judah-socks/
